title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1151.23 - Enforcement of laws, ordinances, rules and regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1151.23 - Enforcement of laws, ordinances, rules and regulations

State Regulations

All current ordinances of the cities or towns adjacent to
facilities of the authority or its subsidiaries, or in which facilities of the
authority or any of its subsidiaries are located, as well as all current local
laws, State and Federal laws and regulations are applicable to members of the
public using the transportation facilities and nothing in these regulations
shall be construed as preventing enforcement by any duly appointed police
officer, security officer or other authorized person. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1151.23

Amended, New

York State Register May 14, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 19, eff. 5/14/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
